ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَٰبَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَهْتَدُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We gave Musa the Book so that perhaps they would be guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And We gave the Book to Moses so that they may be guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And We gave Moses the Book that people might be guided by it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We gave the Book to Moses so that perhaps they may have guidance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed We gave Moosa the Book, that they may attain guidance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed We gave Musa the Scripture, that they may be guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly We gave Musa the Book that they may follow a right direction.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And We gave Moses the Book, that haply they would be guided;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We verily gave Moses the Scripture, that haply they might go aright.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We gave Moses the Book so that they might be guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly We vouchsafed unto Musa the Book, that haply they may be guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly We gave Moses the Book so that they might be guided,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We gave Moses the Book, in order that they might receive guidance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed We gave Musa (Moses) the Scripture, that they may be guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And We gave Moses the Book, in order that they might be guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We gave Moses the Scripture, that they may be guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We certainly gave Moses the Scripture that perhaps they would be guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:49] And verily We gave Moses the Scripture, the Torah, that perhaps they, his people, the Children of Israel, might be guided, thereby from error — he [Moses] was given it [the Scripture] after the destruction of Pharaoh and his folk all at once.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And we verily gave Moses the Scripture) the Torah, (that haply they might go aright) that haply they might be led to guidance.
